channel.title: [PI] How to make a bow fire the same gfx as the crystal bow? rep++
channel.description: Hey, I added the Zaryte bow but id does not have a gfx when attack and when I attack something it sends the message "You have run out of arrows" or if I use rune arrows with it, it says "you cannot use rune arrows with the zaryte bow." Anyone know the correct way to do this without rewriting the crystal bow to just zaryte bow? Thanks in advance!

item.title: [PI] How to make a bow fire the same gfx as the crystal bow? rep++
item.dc:creator: @iamlies iamlies
item.description:
@iamlies wrote:

I tried that last night but when I fire it just says “you have run out of arrows” thanks though

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to make a bow fire the same gfx as the crystal bow? rep++

item.title: [PI] How to make a bow fire the same gfx as the crystal bow? rep++
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Itemassistant.java find the ID of the bow you want it to be the same as and add the ID under the ID of the bow.

Hope this helped

Read full topic
